keyPolicies.policyDescription: I have been working with the local NHS to ensure evening and weekend appointments are offered to patients and will continue to push for further improvements across our GP Surgeries.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: MAKING OUR CITY A SAFER PLACE TO LIVE AND WORK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Prime Minister has announced funding for 20,000 extra police, this is great news and will really help our city. I will continue to lobby to ensure that as well as additional officers, our police have the support and equipment they need.

Southampton needs more jobs that offer higher wages and greater prospects. I have been lobbying the Chancellor and Secretary of State for Transport for additional infrastructure investment in our city so that we can improve employment opportunities for local people.
